name: Mithral Armor
content:
Armor (medium or heavy, but not hide), uncommon 



 Mithral is a light, flexible metal. A mithral chain shirt  or breastplate can be worn under normal clothes. If  the armor normally imposes disadvantage on  Dexterity (Stealth) checks or has a Strength  requirement, the mithral version of the armor  doesnâ€™t.
